name: Excerpt Editor for Beaver Builder
author: Jack Krielen

sections.description:
What Is This Excerpt Editor Addon for Beaver Builder?

The Excerpt Editor addon is build for Beaver Builder to add the possibility to edit the Excerpt of a page or post. (without going out of the front-end builder)

Credits

This plugin: Jack Krielen
Beaver Builder: https://www.wpbeaverbuilder.com/
Translations:
French : Nomad411 from BeaverBuilder
Netherlands: Jack Krielen

Translation

Default: English
Included:
French & Dutch

Feel free to add more translations. I will add them to this plugin
sections.installation:
Install Excerpt Editor for Beaver Builder either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins. Then activate it and go in to the Beaver Builder Front End editor.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
For information on using Excerpt Editor for Beaver Builder, please ask on the WordPress forum

Installation Instructions

Install Excerpt Editor for Beaver Builder either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins. Then activate it and go in to the Beaver Builder Front End editor.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!

* Add French & Dutch translation.

1.0.0

Release Date – 19 January 2018s
* Initial release.

short_description: Adds the Excerpt field to the Page Builder of Beaver Builder (lite)
